alert.note: Alert for Northern El Paso County Including Monument and Black Forest; Pueblo County Including Pueblo; Southern El Paso County Including Fort Carson and Colorado Springs (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued December 25 at 2:52PM MST until December 25 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Red Flag Warning remains in effect until 5 PM today for gusty winds, low relative humidity, and dry fuels for Fire Weather Zones 222, 226, 227, and 228, which includes El Paso, Pueblo, and Fremont Counties... ...Red Flag Warning has been issued from 11 am until 5 pm MST Sunday for very strong winds, low relative humidity, and dry fuels for Fire Weather Zones 226 through 237, which includes El Paso, Pueblo, Huerfano, Las Animas, Crowley, Otero, Kiowa, Bent, Prowers, and Baca Counties... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 226...227 AND 228... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 5 PM MST SUNDAY FOR FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 226...227 AND 228... The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a Red Flag Warning for dry fuels, strong winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 11 AM to 5 PM MST Sunday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 226...227 and 228. * Winds...Southwest 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 15 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Northern El Paso County Including Monument and Black Forest; Pueblo County Including Pueblo; Southern El Paso County Including Fort Carson and Colorado Springs
